synthesis_analysis: The system excels at validating fears and collaboratively building personalized, low-stakes action plans. Its main weakness is inconsistently pairing cognitive strategies with physical regulation techniques and occasionally pushing for practice prematurely. To improve, it must always integrate a discreet physical anchor (e.g., grounding breath) and adapt scripts to the student's natural communication style. The highest priority is refining the "what if" exploration phase to better diagnose the core emotional barrier before problem-solving.
